overview: Kuttavum Shikshayum is a 1976 Indian Malayalam-language film, directed by M. Masthan and produced by K. S. R. Moorthy. The film stars Kamal Haasan, Sridevi, Bahadoor and K. P. Ummer in the lead roles. The film has musical score by M. S. Viswanathan. It was a remake of the 1973 Tamil film Pennai Nambungal.
title: Kuttavum Shikshayum
